articles.title: Emotional scenes as Roberto Firmino gets his 'Golden Samba' fans award - This Is Anfield
articles.description: Roberto Firmino's emotional departure at Liverpool saw him receive the cult 'Golden Samba' fans award in front of the Kop. 📺 Subscribe to This Is Anfield on...

articles.author: Stephen Farrand
articles.title: Geraint Thomas concedes the maglia rosa to focus on Giro d'Italia end game - Cyclingnews
articles.description: 'It was a sign of us controlling our own race, not a weakness' says Ineos Grenadiers DS Tosatto
articles.content: Geraint Thomas conceded the maglia rosa to France's Bruno Armirail on the rain-soaked stage from Switzerland to Cassano Magnago but Ineos Grenadiers insisted it was all part of their long-game and st… [+3508 chars]
